summary:
Cool item pack from Chachachen, fixed/updated by WIlliamIm
Features 14 new weapons and 2 new appearal
descriptionHtml:
COOL ITEMS PACKAGE 2.0


!update!
If you already installed the 1.2 version, you will probably have to get the weapons again. I\'m sorry for this inconvenience . If you update the old file, please make sure the old esp (cool-items-) is gone and replaced by cool_itemsWIfixed.



**WHAT\'S THIS**

Cool items package sold by Belethor. Main file includes previous items including UPDATE1 and UPDATE2 + fix update3

**WHAT\'S NEW**

-2013-
Fix made by WilliamImm.
Now there should be much less errors (tes5edit)

-2012-
14 Unique weapons
2 Apparel Sets

Fixed some minor bugs
Fixed some item models not showing correctly


**INSTRUCTIONS**

___Install by Nexus mod manager___
 --> click it and don\\\\\\\'t touch it anymore ;D


___Manual INstall___

Extract into you Skyrim root directory and overwrite the DATA folder.

At the launcher screen, select DATA FILES. Check the COOL_ITEMSWIFixed (Uncheck other plug ins to ensure maximum compatibility).

Visit BELETHOR\\\\\\\'S GENERAL GOODS at White Run.

If Belethor is dead, missing or just plain retarded, (;D)
open console and type: player.placeatme 0009caf8


UPDATE3

Fixed a lot of errors encountered with TES5EDIT. (WilliamImm)

UPDATE2

1. Handski - Handskian Armor Set, Ivory and Venetian Cloaks Textures

2. Cello - Cheongsam Rose Apparel Textures

3. Sangre - Ianna, Hook Sword, Doubleblade Textures and Models

4. Kerfank - Excalibur Texture and Model

5. Gizmodian - Gizmodian Blade & Edge Textures and Models

UPDATE1

1. Hentai - Seraphim Blade model and texture

2. Adonnay - Hadhafang model and texture

3.Urwy- Daedric Crescent model and texture

4. Jojjo - Frostmourne and Frostvain model and texture

5. Nicos - Ebony Nicos model and texture

6. Deus-19581 - Ninjutsu Kama model and texture

7. L33Nexus - Death Scythe model and texture

MAIN

1. BerserkerMonk - Aurumere texture

2. Phate3 - Stajr texture

3. Bittermace - Ogramak texture

4. MelodicShredder - Pinkutaichi texture

5. LetoKolente - Auric Bow texture

6. Ero - Portcullis texture

7. Quetzlsacatanango - file.nif texture paths

8. Seycho - Seychos texture

9. Shokkimonkii & Invalidfate - Yamato mesh and texture & porting

10. 747823 - Umbra texture

11.Lucumbration - Lucumbra texture

12.Nickoli - Malleus Obsicum (obsidian) texture

13.Zxeddery - Zsedry Arrow (skyrim) texture

14.N1kko & Burntbicuit - Sword of Aeons texture

15.MelodicShredder- Hell Slasher Blade texture

16.NIHS - Chrome Razor mesh and texture

If you come across a weapon that belongs to you and is given wrong in the credits, please pm me so i\'ll correct it. Thnx!
author: Chachanshen _fix WilliamImm_

files.changelogHtml: Fix for a lot of errors found in TES5Edit
